multitext.text: To play this game you require the latest version Flash Player. Please click the link below and follow the quick and simple installation instructions.
Note that any Jackpots are shown and paid in your account currency.

The server is currently undergoing maintenance. Your game should resume automatically in a couple of minutes.
WINS MULTIPLIED BY BET PER LINE. Only the highest win per active bet line is paid. Bet line wins pay if in succession from leftmost to right. Malfunction voids all pays.

2 or more bonus symbols triggers the respins feature
Wild symbols, bonus symbols, and a randomly selected symbol lock for respins
The wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except the bonus symbol
The bonus symbol substitutes for all other symbols

Firestorm
About the game Firestorm is a 5 reel, 25 bet line video slot. The game features stacked symbols and a respins feature with locking symbols. Theoretical payout is 96,57%
How to play Video slots are very easy to play. Just follow these 3 steps:
1. Choose your total bet 2. Press the SPIN symbol button 3. Check for any win in the WIN field
Description of game functionality
Bet The Total bet is shown in the TOTAL BET display. Change the Total Bet by clicking on the display and choosing the total bet of your choice. The TOTAL BET is based on the bet per line multiplied by the number of active win lines which is fixed at 40. The number of bet lines used in the game can be changed by clicking on the BET LINES display.
Spin The game is started by pressing the SPIN button. You can Quick Stop the game by pressing the SPIN button again.
Win Any total win in a game round will be displayed in the WIN field All wins are multiplied by the bet per line. Bet line wins pay in succession from leftmost to right. Only the highest win per active bet line is paid. The separate bet line wins will be displayed on the bet lines during win presentation.
Paytable All winning combinations in the game can be viewed in the PAYTABLE.
Fast Play The FAST PLAY functionality is used to get the shortest game round possible. The duration of game rounds may vary depending on bandwidth and server response time.
Autoplay Autoplay allows you to play a number of game rounds automatically Press AUTOPLAY and choose a number of game rounds to initiate Autoplay. The remaining number of spins is displayed to the right of the STOP button. Autoplay is stopped by pressing the STOP button.
Settings In the settings panel at the bottom left of the game you can choose: - Use SPACE for spin Use SPACE for spin allows you to use your Space Bar on your keyboard to initiate game rounds.
- Show Splash Screen on startup This setting allows you to switch the games Splash Screen on and off.
Special symbols
Wild Symbols The game has two different types of Wild Symbols: Regular wild symbols substitute for all symbols except Bonus symbol. Bonus symbols substitute for all other symbols.
Bonus symbols Two or more Bonus symbols in the Main game initiate the Respin feature. When three Bonus symbols appear in the Main game, the Respin feature is initiated and the Main game win is multiplied by 2.
Game Features Respin Feature At the beginning of the Respin feature, a symbol is randomly selected, and that symbol, along with Regular wild symbols and Bonus symbols, are the locking symbols for that Respin feature. All of the locking symbols that appear on the initiating spin are locked into place, and the reels are spun again. On a respin, if there are any locking symbols that appear that did not appear before the respin, those symbols are locked into place, and if not all of the positions on the reels are locked, another respin is awarded. For each Bonus symbol that appears after the 2nd Bonus symbol, the Respins multiplier is incremented, up to a maximum of 5x. When all positions are locked or no new locking symbols appear on a respin, the Respin feature ends. The total win from the Respin feature is the Main game win from the initiating spin at the initiating multiplier, plus the win evaluated on the final respin times the final Respin multiplier.
Malfunction in the game voids all pays.
